text: The International Film Music Critics Association Award for Best Original Score for a Documentary is an annual award given by the International Film Music Critics Association, or the IFMCA. The award is given to the composer of a film or television score for an documentary deemed to be the best in a given year. The award was first given in 2008, for film documentary scores only. Since then, however, documentary series have been included into the category.
